text: D'Azeglio is an Italian surname and may refer to: *Massimo d'Azeglio (1798–1866), Italian statesman, novelist and painter *Roberto d'Azeglio (1790–1862), Italian painter. *Vittorio Emanuele Taparelli d'Azeglio (1816–1890), Italian diplomat *Liceo Classico Massimo d'Azeglio, a public sixth form college/senior high school in Turin, Italy. ==See also== *Azeglio *Azeglio Vicini
title: D'Azeglio (disambiguation)
